title: Divya Ruby Floral Raasi Haaram
features: Intricate floral design with a central ruby, adorned with brilliant CZ stones. Teardrop motifs along the necklace chain. The detailed filigree work captures the essence of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship, reimagined for a modern aesthetic.
colors: Warm Gold with vibrant Ruby red and sparkling White CZ stones.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for festive gatherings and cultural events.
description: This Raasi Haaram is a fusion of tradition and contemporary design. The central ruby exudes elegance and charm, while the intricate gold work showcases the skill of our master artisans. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting brilliance and a premium feel. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, this piece is a timeless investment.
